column4: Israel renews licensing agreement with Microsoft
column5: JERUSALEM Israel's government signed a new software supply deal with Microsoft on Tuesday  three months after saying it would not renew its contract with the firm due to a change in license terms that would have doubled its price.

column4: Israel renews licensing agreement with Microsoft
column5: JERUSALEM  Nov 13 Israel's government signed a new software supply deal with Microsoft on Tuesday  three months after saying it would not renew its contract with the firm due to a change in license terms that would have doubled its price.
